arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Making an enemy {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to grant {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0" * Affix."Static Value 2"|%+|]{/c}.
